data.text:
――Alright. With this, it looks like 
we're done loading all the luggage.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>――Alright. With this, it looks like 
<story>we're done loading all the luggage.

data.text:
――Alright. With this, it looks like 
we're done loading all the luggage.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>――Alright. With this, it looks like 
<story>we're done loading all the luggage.

data.text:
Very well. ……Well then, Team <Ascella>! 
Is everyone here? We're doing the final checks before departing!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Very well. ……Well then, Team <Ascella>! 
<story>Is everyone here? We're doing the final checks before departing!

data.text:
Okaaa~aay, Team Member #1 is here~. 
All of my luggage has already been loaded~.
data.name: Antenna-haired Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>Okaaa~aay, Team Member #1 is here~. 
<story>All of my luggage has already been loaded~.

data.text:
I've also finished! Ah, I brought along a lot 
of snacks, so let's eat them during the ride!
data.name: Single Knot Uma Musume
data.processed:
<story>I've also finished! Ah, I brought along a lot 
<story>of snacks, so let's eat them during the ride!

data.text:
Wait, I thought you had more luggage than normal but……Geez. 
……and, how about the two new members? Are you all set?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Wait, I thought you had more luggage than normal but……Geez. 
<story>……and, how about the two new members? Are you all set?

data.text: Yes. Cesario here, no issues.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Yes. Cesario here, no issues.

data.text:
Rhein Kraft too! 
I……Um, probably, haven't forgotten anything.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Rhein Kraft too! 
<story>I……Um, probably, haven't forgotten anything.

data.text:
P-probably haven't? If anything comes up, 
don't hold back and just tell me, okay……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>P-probably haven't? If anything comes up, 
<story>don't hold back and just tell me, okay……?

data.text:
P-probably haven't? If anything comes up, 
don't hold back and just tell me, okay……?
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>P-probably haven't? If anything comes up, 
<story>don't hold back and just tell me, okay……?

data.text:
Right. After all――Kraft-san. 
This expedition is for your sake.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Right. After all――Kraft-san. 
<story>This expedition is for your sake.

data.text:
Alright, we should get going then! 
Everyone, get in the car!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, we should get going then! 
<story>Everyone, get in the car!

data.text:
Alright, we should get going then! 
Everyone, get in the car!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Alright, we should get going then! 
<story>Everyone, get in the car!

data.text: And we're off, to Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>And we're off, to Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』!

data.text: And we're off, to Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』!
data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>And we're off, to Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』!

data.text: Oooouu!!
data.name: Team Members
data.processed: <story>Oooouu!!

data.text:
I'm looking forward to it! My first G1…… 
With everyone's support, I'll be sure to make it count!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I'm looking forward to it! My first G1…… 
<story>With everyone's support, I'll be sure to make it count!

data.text:
And, more importantly, are you feeling okay? 
Did you get enough sleep yesterday? Are those dark 
circles under your eyes just my imagination?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>And, more importantly, are you feeling okay? 
<story>Did you get enough sleep yesterday? Are those dark 
<story>circles under your eyes just my imagination?

data.text:
……Seems like you were so nervous you didn't sleep 
very well. Geez, you're as blockheaded as usual!
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……Seems like you were so nervous you didn't sleep 
<story>very well. Geez, you're as blockheaded as usual!

data.text:
Anyways, to get to the inn near the Hanshin 
Racecourse, it'll take about eight hours, 
including breaks! Make sure you drive properly.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Anyways, to get to the inn near the Hanshin 
<story>Racecourse, it'll take about eight hours, 
<story>including breaks! Make sure you drive properly.

data.text:
If you start dozing off, I'll be right beside 
you to pinch your thighs and wake you up.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>If you start dozing off, I'll be right beside 
<story>you to pinch your thighs and wake you up.

data.text: Ah. I think it's about time to move in to the right-hand lane.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed: <story>Ah. I think it's about time to move in to the right-hand lane.

data.text:
Yeah, yeah, stay focused. ……That said, before 
we knew it, everyone's already asleep. I 
suppose they all didn't get much sleep either.
data.name: King Halo

choices.text: It's fine if you sleep too
It's fine if you sleep too

data.processed:
<story>Yeah, yeah, stay focused. ……That said, before 
<story>we knew it, everyone's already asleep. I 
<story>suppose they all didn't get much sleep either.

data.text:
I'm awake to keep watch over you, dummy. There's a lot 
riding on this you know, so it's a big responsibility.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>I'm awake to keep watch over you, dummy. There's a lot 
<story>riding on this you know, so it's a big responsibility.

data.text:
……Really, we've gotten quite a few new members, 
haven't we? Did you ever imagine that we'd be 
able to fill up this van so quickly?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>……Really, we've gotten quite a few new members, 
<story>haven't we? Did you ever imagine that we'd be 
<story>able to fill up this van so quickly?

data.text:
Probably not. ……when my dad was the 
Trainer, this car wasn't enough though――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Probably not. ……when my dad was the 
<story>Trainer, this car wasn't enough though――

data.text:
Probably not. ……when my dad was the 
Trainer, this car wasn't enough though――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Probably not. ……when my dad was the 
<story>Trainer, this car wasn't enough though――

data.text:
<username>. From now on, I'm leaving the Trainer role 
of Team <Ascella> to you. ……Understood? Do it properly.
data.name: Father
data.processed:
<story><username>. From now on, I'm leaving the Trainer role 
<story>of Team <Ascella> to you. ……Understood? Do it properly.

data.text:
Since I took over the team, the number of members 
has decreased, huh? Now that I think about it, 
there was a time when it was just the two of us……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Since I took over the team, the number of members 
<story>has decreased, huh? Now that I think about it, 
<story>there was a time when it was just the two of us……

data.text:
Since I took over the team, the number of members 
has decreased, huh? Now that I think about it, 
there was a time when it was just the two of us……
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Since I took over the team, the number of members 
<story>has decreased, huh? Now that I think about it, 
<story>there was a time when it was just the two of us……

data.text:
Now that you mention it, there was. ……It's a bit nostalgic. 
And now it's grown this much――
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Now that you mention it, there was. ……It's a bit nostalgic. 
<story>And now it's grown this much――

data.text:
On top of that, even two promising rookies that can handle G1 races 
joined. ……It's shaping up to be quite the team, don't you think?
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>On top of that, even two promising rookies that can handle G1 races 
<story>joined. ……It's shaping up to be quite the team, don't you think?

data.text:
Rhein Kraft and Cesario have both breathed new 
life in to Team <Ascella>. The first time meeting 
both of them is still vivid in my memory――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Rhein Kraft and Cesario have both breathed new 
<story>life in to Team <Ascella>. The first time meeting 
<story>both of them is still vivid in my memory――

data.text:
Rhein Kraft and Cesario have both breathed new 
life in to Team <Ascella>. The first time meeting 
both of them is still vivid in my memory――
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Rhein Kraft and Cesario have both breathed new 
<story>life in to Team <Ascella>. The first time meeting 
<story>both of them is still vivid in my memory――

data.text:
Now, all the Uma Musume have entered their gates. 
Each Uma Musume is eager to show off their strength 
in order to be scouted by a trainer――
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>Now, all the Uma Musume have entered their gates. 
<story>Each Uma Musume is eager to show off their strength 
<story>in order to be scouted by a trainer――

data.text: Preparations are complete. Now, the Selection race starts!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed: <story>Preparations are complete. Now, the Selection race starts!!

data.text: Yaa……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed: <story>Yaa……!!

data.text:
And quickly getting in to a good position is Rhein Kraft! 
She's off to an outstanding start!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>And quickly getting in to a good position is Rhein Kraft! 
<story>She's off to an outstanding start!

data.text:
Uooooh, as expected! She's giving us a good show 
right from the start~……! Just like was mentioned, 
Rhein Kraft has some considerable abilities!
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Uooooh, as expected! She's giving us a good show 
<story>right from the start~……! Just like was mentioned, 
<story>Rhein Kraft has some considerable abilities!

data.text:
(To be able to accelerate up to full speed that quickly…… 
she has quite the talent when it comes to speed!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(To be able to accelerate up to full speed that quickly…… 
<story>she has quite the talent when it comes to speed!)

data.text:
(To be able to accelerate up to full speed that quickly…… 
she has quite the talent when it comes to speed!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(To be able to accelerate up to full speed that quickly…… 
<story>she has quite the talent when it comes to speed!)

data.text:
(Able to concentrate and avoid a late start, able to judge the 
best position to take……it was quite the eye-opening potential……!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Able to concentrate and avoid a late start, able to judge the 
<story>best position to take……it was quite the eye-opening potential……!)

data.text:
Haa, haa, haa……! 
I can still keep going……like this……!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Haa, haa, haa……! 
<story>I can still keep going……like this……!!

data.text:
Alright, she seems to be regulating her pace well! Like that, 
don't you think Rhein Kraft might just win outright!?
data.name: Rookie Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>Alright, she seems to be regulating her pace well! Like that, 
<story>don't you think Rhein Kraft might just win outright!?

data.text:
……No, it doesn't look like it. 
After all, look, now that they've entered the latter half――!!
data.name: Mid-rank Trainer A
data.processed:
<story>……No, it doesn't look like it. 
<story>After all, look, now that they've entered the latter half――!!

data.text: ――Fuuu……!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>――Fuuu……!!

data.text:
With 400m left, here comes Cesario! Cesario with the speed!! 
She breaks through the group from behind and quickly pulls away!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>With 400m left, here comes Cesario! Cesario with the speed!! 
<story>She breaks through the group from behind and quickly pulls away!!

data.text:
What terrifying speed! She easily pulls away 
from the other Uma Musume! Cesario, with that 
burst, quickly approaches Rhein Kraft in the lead!!
data.name: Live Announcer
data.processed:
<story>What terrifying speed! She easily pulls away 
<story>from the other Uma Musume! Cesario, with that 
<story>burst, quickly approaches Rhein Kraft in the lead!!

data.text:
(She must have been preserving her strength, 
but look at that form! She didn't just stand 
out……she was on a completely different level!!!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(She must have been preserving her strength, 
<story>but look at that form! She didn't just stand 
<story>out……she was on a completely different level!!!)

data.text: Haaaaaaaaaa!!
data.name: Cesario
data.processed: <story>Haaaaaaaaaa!!

data.text:
! So you've made it, like I thought……! 
But! Yaaaaaaaaaー!!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>! So you've made it, like I thought……! 
<story>But! Yaaaaaaaaaー!!

data.text:
(She caught back up……! Will Cesario continue on just like this!? 
No, Rhein Kraft shows no signs of giving up just yet!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(She caught back up……! Will Cesario continue on just like this!? 
<story>No, Rhein Kraft shows no signs of giving up just yet!)

data.text:
(She caught back up……! Will Cesario continue on just like this!? 
No, Rhein Kraft shows no signs of giving up just yet!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(She caught back up……! Will Cesario continue on just like this!? 
<story>No, Rhein Kraft shows no signs of giving up just yet!)

data.text:
(The other girls can't keep up at all! 
Those two……it's become a one-on-one battle……!!)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(The other girls can't keep up at all! 
<story>Those two……it's become a one-on-one battle……!!)

data.text: Aaaaaaaaaaah!
data.name: Kraft & Cesario
data.processed: <story>Aaaaaaaaaaah!

data.name: <username>
data.processed: <story>……!!

data.text:
There was a roar of cheers. An announcment. 
But all of it seemed so far away. That's just 
how――impressed by Rhein Kraft and Cesario I was!
data.processed:
<story>There was a roar of cheers. An announcment. 
<story>But all of it seemed so far away. That's just 
<story>how――impressed by Rhein Kraft and Cesario I was!

data.text:
(Of course, every team wanted to scout them. Even the 
most 『Talented』 trainers in my year felt that way)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Of course, every team wanted to scout them. Even the 
<story>most 『Talented』 trainers in my year felt that way)

data.text:
(Of course, every team wanted to scout them. Even the 
most 『Talented』 trainers in my year felt that way)
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>(Of course, every team wanted to scout them. Even the 
<story>most 『Talented』 trainers in my year felt that way)

data.text:
Nice to meet you, Trainer-san! 
I'm Rhein Kraft!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Nice to meet you, Trainer-san! 
<story>I'm Rhein Kraft!

data.text:
My name is Cesario. 
Thank you very much for coming to see this Selection race.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>My name is Cesario. 
<story>Thank you very much for coming to see this Selection race.

data.text:
Um, the two of us will do our best! 
And――we want to join Team <Ascella>!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Um, the two of us will do our best! 
<story>And――we want to join Team <Ascella>!

data.text:
Will you become our trainer? 
……I'm looking forward to working with you.
data.name: Cesario
data.processed:
<story>Will you become our trainer? 
<story>……I'm looking forward to working with you.

data.text:
――I didn't expect both of them to approach me first, so I was 
really surprised. I still wonder why they chose our team.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>――I didn't expect both of them to approach me first, so I was 
<story>really surprised. I still wonder why they chose our team.

data.text:
But still, since they joined……I want to help 
them win. Since these two were already talented, 
I'll have to put in the effort to match.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But still, since they joined……I want to help 
<story>them win. Since these two were already talented, 
<story>I'll have to put in the effort to match.

data.text:
But still, since they joined……I want to help 
them win. Since these two were already talented, 
I'll have to put in the effort to match.
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>But still, since they joined……I want to help 
<story>them win. Since these two were already talented, 
<story>I'll have to put in the effort to match.

data.text:
True. ……And so, how do you feel about the results 
you've worked hard for? Kraft-san's 『Hanshin JF』, 
do you think she has a good chance of winning?
data.name: King Halo

choices.text: Yeah. I think we can win.
Yeah. I think we can win.

data.processed:
<story>True. ……And so, how do you feel about the results 
<story>you've worked hard for? Kraft-san's 『Hanshin JF』, 
<story>do you think she has a good chance of winning?

data.text:
She won her debut, and her major last month. And her training 
could almost be called perfect. I think we're fully prepared.
data.name: <username>

choices.text: Her first G1. Hope she isn't nervous――
choices.processed: <size=41>Her first G1. Hope she isn't nervous――</size>

choices.text: Her first G1. Hope she isn't nervous――
choices.processed: <size=41>Her first G1. Hope she isn't nervous――</size>

data.processed:
<story>She won her debut, and her major last month. And her training 
<story>could almost be called perfect. I think we're fully prepared.

data.text:
Don't you think she's fine? She was sleeping 
so soundly in the car. She's surprisingly 
resilient……she might even be one of the strongest.
data.name: King Halo
data.processed:
<story>Don't you think she's fine? She was sleeping 
<story>so soundly in the car. She's surprisingly 
<story>resilient……she might even be one of the strongest.

data.text:
She might be. This is a race where the top class Junior 
Uma Musume gather but……if it's Rhein Kraft then――!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She might be. This is a race where the top class Junior 
<story>Uma Musume gather but……if it's Rhein Kraft then――!

data.text:
She might be. This is a race where the top class Junior 
Uma Musume gather but……if it's Rhein Kraft then――!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>She might be. This is a race where the top class Junior 
<story>Uma Musume gather but……if it's Rhein Kraft then――!

data.text:
After the long journey, and a short night――it was finally time. 
The day of Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』……
data.processed:
<story>After the long journey, and a short night――it was finally time. 
<story>The day of Rhein Kraft's 『Hanshin JF』……

data.text:
Suuu……――Huuuu. 
……Yeah, alright!
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Suuu……――Huuuu. 
<story>……Yeah, alright!

data.text:
Yes! Trainer-san, just watch me. 
I'll definitely win.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>Yes! Trainer-san, just watch me. 
<story>I'll definitely win.

data.text:
I'll prove it right here! 
That I'm worthy of being on your team.
data.name: Rhein Kraft
data.processed:
<story>I'll prove it right here! 
<story>That I'm worthy of being on your team.

data.text:
Kraft……yeah. 
On this G1 stage, go show them your full strength!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft……yeah. 
<story>On this G1 stage, go show them your full strength!

data.text:
Kraft……yeah. 
On this G1 stage, go show them your full strength!
data.name: <username>
data.processed:
<story>Kraft……yeah. 
<story>On this G1 stage, go show them your full strength!
